pitchLab.reference
Class Calculations

java.lang.Object
  pitchLab.reference.Calculations

public class Calculations
extends java.lang.Object

This class does all the calculations needed to create tones, pixel positions and anything else requring math.

Version:
0.6 April 7, 2009
Author:
Gavin Shriver
